name: Absorb
flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Accelerock
flavorText: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

name: Acid
flavorText: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

name: Acid Armor
flavorText: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

name: Acid Spray
flavorText: The user attacks by spitting fluid that works to melt the target. This also harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Acrobatics
flavorText: The user nimbly strikes the target. This attack does massive damage if the user isn’t holding an item.

name: Acupressure
flavorText: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies’ stats.

name: Aerial Ace
flavorText: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

name: After You
flavorText: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

name: Agility
flavorText: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply boosts its Speed stat.

name: Air Cutter
flavorText: The user launches razor-like wind to slash opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Air Slash
flavorText: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Ally Switch
flavorText: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies. This move’s chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Amnesia
flavorText: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply boosts the user’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Ancient Power
flavorText: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also boost all the user’s stats at once.

name: Apple Acid
flavorText: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Aqua Cutter
flavorText: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Aqua Jet
flavorText: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Aqua Ring
flavorText: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

name: Aqua Step
flavorText: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user’s Speed stat.

name: Aqua Tail
flavorText: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: Armor Cannon
flavorText: The user shoots its own armor out as blazing projectiles. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Arm Thrust
flavorText: The user attacks the target with open-palmed arm thrusts. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Aromatic Mist
flavorText: The user boosts the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

name: Assurance
flavorText: This move’s power is doubled if the target has already taken some damage in the same turn.

name: Astonish
flavorText: The user attacks the target by crying out in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Astral Barrage
flavorText: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

name: Attack Order
flavorText: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Attract
flavorText: If the target is of the opposite gender to the user, it becomes infatuated with the user and will sometimes be unable to use its moves.

name: Aura Sphere
flavorText: The user lets loose a pulse of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

name: Aurora Beam
flavorText: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

name: Aurora Veil
flavorText: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only when it is snowing.

name: Avalanche
flavorText: This move’s power is doubled if the target has inflicted damage on the user in the same turn.

name: Axe Kick
flavorText: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming its heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the target. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

name: Baby-Doll Eyes
flavorText: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target’s Attack stat. This move always goes first.

name: Baneful Bunker
flavorText: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Barb Barrage
flavorText: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move’s power is doubled if the target is already poisoned.

name: Baton Pass
flavorText: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

name: Beat Up
flavorText: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

name: Behemoth Bash
flavorText: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target. This move inflicts twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Behemoth Blade
flavorText: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target. This move inflicts twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Belch
flavorText: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

name: Belly Drum
flavorText: The user maximizes its Attack stat but loses HP equal to half its max HP.

name: Bind
flavorText: A long body, tentacles, or the like are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

name: Bite
flavorText: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Bitter Blade
flavorText: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user’s HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Bitter Malice
flavorText: The user attacks the target with spine-chilling resentment. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Blast Burn
flavorText: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Blaze Kick
flavorText: The user launches a kick that has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Bleakwind Storm
flavorText: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also lower the Speed stats of opposing Pokémon.

name: Blizzard
flavorText: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

name: Block
flavorText: The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread wide to prevent the target from fleeing.

name: Body Press
flavorText: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user’s Defense stat, the greater the damage this move deals.

name: Body Slam
flavorText: The user attacks by dropping onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Bone Rush
flavorText: The user attacks by striking the target with a hard bone. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Boomburst
flavorText: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible explosive sound.

name: Bounce
flavorText: The user bounces up high on the first turn, then drops onto the target on the next turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Branch Poke
flavorText: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

name: Brave Bird
flavorText: The user tucks in its wings and charges at a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Breaking Swipe
flavorText: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

name: Brick Break
flavorText: The user attacks with a swift chop. This move can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Brine
flavorText: This move’s power is doubled if the target’s HP is at half or less.

name: Brutal Swing
flavorText: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

name: Bubble Beam
flavorText: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower the target’s Speed stat.

name: Bug Bite
flavorText: The user attacks by biting the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Bug Buzz
flavorText: The user vibrates to generate a damaging sound wave. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Bulk Up
flavorText: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Bulldoze
flavorText: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

name: Bullet Punch
flavorText: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

name: Bullet Seed
flavorText: The user attacks by forcefully shooting seeds at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Burning Jealousy
flavorText: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.

name: Burn Up
flavorText: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

name: Calm Mind
flavorText: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to boost its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: Ceaseless Edge
flavorText: The user slashes its shell blade at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Shell splinters left behind by this attack remain scattered under the target as spikes.

name: Celebrate
flavorText: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

name: Charge
flavorText: The user becomes charged, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move it uses. This also boosts the user’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Charge Beam
flavorText: The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The residual electricity may also boost the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Charm
flavorText: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Chilling Water
flavorText: The user attacks the target by showering it with water that’s so cold it saps the target’s power. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Chilly Reception
flavorText: The user tells a chillingly bad joke before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting. This summons a snowstorm lasting five turns.

name: Chloroblast
flavorText: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user.

name: Circle Throw
flavorText: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Clear Smog
flavorText: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are eliminated.

name: Close Combat
flavorText: The user fights the target up close, inflicting damage without guarding itself. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Coaching
flavorText: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

name: Coil
flavorText: The user coils up and concentrates. This boosts its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

name: Collision Course
flavorText: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. This move’s power is boosted more than usual if it’s a supereffective hit.

name: Comeuppance
flavorText: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

name: Confide
flavorText: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Confuse Ray
flavorText: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that causes confusion.

name: Confusion
flavorText: The target is hit with a weak telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also confuse the target.

name: Copycat
flavorText: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. This move fails if no other move has been used yet.

name: Corrosive Gas
flavorText: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items held by other Pokémon.

name: Cosmic Power
flavorText: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to boost its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Cotton Guard
flavorText: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically boosting its Defense stat.

name: Cotton Spore
flavorText: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to opposing Pokémon. This harshly lowers their Speed stats.

name: Counter
flavorText: A retaliatory attack that counters any physical move, inflicting double the damage taken.

name: Court Change
flavorText: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

name: Covet
flavorText: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target’s held item.

name: Crabhammer
flavorText: The target is hammered with a large pincer. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Cross Chop
flavorText: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Cross Poison
flavorText: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Crunch
flavorText: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Crush Claw
flavorText: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Curse
flavorText: A move that has different effects depending on whether the user is a Ghost type or not.

name: Cut
flavorText: The target is cut with a scythe, a claw, or the like to inflict damage.

name: Darkest Lariat
flavorText: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target’s stat changes don’t affect the damage inflicted by this move.

name: Dark Pulse
flavorText: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with ill intent. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Dazzling Gleam
flavorText: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

name: Defend Order
flavorText: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, boosting its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Defense Curl
flavorText: The user curls up and boosts its Defense stat.

name: Defog
flavorText: A strong wind blows away the target’s barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target’s evasiveness.

name: Destiny Bond
flavorText: If the user is knocked out after using this move, the Pokémon that knocked it out will also faint. This move’s chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Detect
flavorText: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Diamond Storm
flavorText: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply boost the user’s Defense stat.

name: Dig
flavorText: The user burrows into the ground on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

name: Dire Claw
flavorText: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws, aiming to land a critical hit. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.

name: Disable
flavorText: For four turns, the target will be unable to use whichever move it last used.

name: Disarming Voice
flavorText: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

name: Discharge
flavorText: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also leave those hit by the attack with paralysis.

name: Dive
flavorText: The user dives on the first turn, then floats up and attacks on the next turn.

name: Doodle
flavorText: The user captures the very essence of the target in a sketch. This changes the Abilities of the user and its ally Pokémon to that of the target.

name: Double-Edge
flavorText: A reckless life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Double Hit
flavorText: The user slams the target with a tail or the like. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Double Kick
flavorText: The user attacks by kicking the target twice in a row using two feet.

name: Double Shock
flavorText: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

name: Double Team
flavorText: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to boost its evasiveness.

name: Draco Meteor
flavorText: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Dragon Ascent
flavorText: The user attacks the target by dropping out of the sky at high speed. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Dragon Breath
flavorText: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Dragon Claw
flavorText: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws to inflict damage.

name: Dragon Dance
flavorText: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

name: Dragon Darts
flavorText: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two opposing Pokémon, this move hits each of them once.

name: Dragon Energy
flavorText: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

name: Dragon Pulse
flavorText: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

name: Dragon Rush
flavorText: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Dragon Tail
flavorText: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Draining Kiss
flavorText: The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half the damage taken by the target.

name: Drain Punch
flavorText: The user attacks with an energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Dream Eater
flavorText: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user’s HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Drill Peck
flavorText: A corkscrewing attack that strikes the target with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

name: Drill Run
flavorText: The user crashes into the target while rotating its body like a drill. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Drum Beating
flavorText: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum’s roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Dual Wingbeat
flavorText: The user slams the target with its wings to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Dynamax Cannon
flavorText: The user condenses energy within its body and unleashes that energy from its core to inflict damage.

name: Dynamic Punch
flavorText: The user attacks by punching the target with full concentrated power. This also confuses the target.

name: Earth Power
flavorText: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Earthquake
flavorText: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

name: Echoed Voice
flavorText: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used consecutively by any Pokémon, its power is boosted.

name: Eerie Impulse
flavorText: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Eerie Spell
flavorText: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also drains 3 PP from the move last used by the target.

name: Electric Terrain
flavorText: The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground can no longer fall asleep.

name: Electro Ball
flavorText: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Electro Drift
flavorText: The user races forward at ultrafast speeds, piercing its target with futuristic electricity. This move’s power is boosted more than usual if it’s a supereffective hit.

name: Electroweb
flavorText: The user captures opposing Pokémon in an electric net to inflict damage. This also lowers their Speed stats.

name: Ember
flavorText: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Encore
flavorText: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

name: Endeavor
flavorText: The user inflicts damage by cutting down the target’s HP to roughly equal the user’s HP.

name: Endure
flavorText: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. This move’s chance of failing rises if used in succession.

name: Energy Ball
flavorText: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Entrainment
flavorText: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.

name: Eruption
flavorText: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

name: Esper Wing
flavorText: The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also boosts the user’s Speed stat. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Expanding Force
flavorText: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. When the ground is Psychic Terrain, this move’s power is boosted and it damages all opposing Pokémon.

name: Explosion
flavorText: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Extrasensory
flavorText: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Extreme Speed
flavorText: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Facade
flavorText: This move’s power is doubled if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

name: Fairy Lock
flavorText: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

name: Fairy Wind
flavorText: The user attacks by stirring up a fairy wind to strike the target.

name: Fake Out
flavorText: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It works only on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

name: Fake Tears
flavorText: The user feigns crying to fluster the target. This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: False Surrender
flavorText: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

name: False Swipe
flavorText: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Feather Dance
flavorText: The user covers the target’s body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

name: Feint
flavorText: This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

name: Fell Stinger
flavorText: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat is boosted drastically.

name: Fiery Dance
flavorText: Cloaked in flames, the user attacks the target by dancing and flapping its wings. This may also boost the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Fiery Wrath
flavorText: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

name: Fillet Away
flavorText: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats by using its own HP.

name: Final Gambit
flavorText: The user risks everything to attack the target. The user faints but inflicts damage equal to its own HP.

name: Fire Blast
flavorText: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Fire Fang
flavorText: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

name: Fire Lash
flavorText: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Fire Pledge
flavorText: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass counterpart, this move’s power is boosted and a vast sea of fire appears.

name: Fire Punch
flavorText: The target is attacked with a fiery punch. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Fire Spin
flavorText: The user traps the target inside a fierce vortex of fire that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

name: First Impression
flavorText: Although this move has great power, it works only on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

name: Fissure
flavorText: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Flail
flavorText: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move’s power.

name: Flame Charge
flavorText: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target. Then, building up momentum, the user boosts its Speed stat.

name: Flamethrower
flavorText: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Flame Wheel
flavorText: The user attacks by cloaking itself in fire and charging at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Flare Blitz
flavorText: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with a burn.

name: Flash Cannon
flavorText: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Flatter
flavorText: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also boosts the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Fleur Cannon
flavorText: The user unleashes a strong beam. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Fling
flavorText: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move’s power and effects depend on the item.

name: Flip Turn
flavorText: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Flower Trick
flavorText: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target. This attack never misses and always lands a critical hit.

name: Fly
flavorText: The user flies up into the sky on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

name: Flying Press
flavorText: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

name: Focus Blast
flavorText: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Focus Energy
flavorText: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that its future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits.

name: Focus Punch
flavorText: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before using the move.

name: Follow Me
flavorText: The user draws attention to itself, making all opposing Pokémon take aim only at the user.

name: Force Palm
flavorText: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Foul Play
flavorText: The user turns the target’s strength against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the damage this move inflicts.

name: Freeze-Dry
flavorText: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

name: Freezing Glare
flavorText: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Frenzy Plant
flavorText: The user slams the target with the roots of an enormous tree. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Frost Breath
flavorText: The user attacks by blowing its cold breath on the target. This move always lands a critical hit.

name: Fury Attack
flavorText: The user attacks by jabbing the target with a horn, a beak, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Fury Cutter
flavorText: The user attacks by slashing the target with scythes, claws, or the like. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

name: Fury Swipes
flavorText: The user attacks by raking the target with claws, scythes, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Future Sight
flavorText: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

name: Gastro Acid
flavorText: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

name: Giga Drain
flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Giga Impact
flavorText: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Gigaton Hammer
flavorText: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This move can’t be used twice in a row.

name: Glacial Lance
flavorText: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

name: Glaive Rush
flavorText: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. Attacks from opposing Pokémon during the next turn cannot miss and will inflict double damage.

name: Glare
flavorText: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

name: Grass Knot
flavorText: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Grass Pledge
flavorText: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water counterpart, this move’s power is boosted and a vast swamp appears.

name: Grassy Glide
flavorText: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.

name: Grassy Terrain
flavorText: The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.

name: Grav Apple
flavorText: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Gravity
flavorText: Enables Flying types or Pokémon with the Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves for five turns. Moves that involve flying can’t be used.

name: Growl
flavorText: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.

name: Growth
flavorText: The user’s body grows all at once, boosting the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Guard Split
flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

name: Guard Swap
flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

name: Guillotine
flavorText: A vicious tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Gunk Shot
flavorText: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

name: Gust
flavorText: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

name: Gyro Ball
flavorText: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user is than the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Hammer Arm
flavorText: The user swings its strong, heavy fist at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user’s Speed stat.

name: Happy Hour
flavorText: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.

name: Harden
flavorText: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to boost its Defense stat.

name: Haze
flavorText: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

name: Headbutt
flavorText: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Headlong Rush
flavorText: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Head Smash
flavorText: The user attacks the target with a hazardous full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

name: Heal Bell
flavorText: The user makes a soothing bell chime to cure the status conditions of all its fellow party Pokémon and allies.

name: Healing Wish
flavorText: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

name: Heal Pulse
flavorText: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target’s HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Heart Swap
flavorText: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Heat Crash
flavorText: The user slams into the target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Heat Wave
flavorText: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on opposing Pokémon. This may also leave them with a burn.

name: Heavy Slam
flavorText: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Helping Hand
flavorText: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally’s attack.

name: Hex
flavorText: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

name: High Horsepower
flavorText: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

name: High Jump Kick
flavorText: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

name: Hold Back
flavorText: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Hold Hands
flavorText: The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them very happy.

name: Hone Claws
flavorText: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

name: Horn Attack
flavorText: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

name: Horn Drill
flavorText: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Horn Leech
flavorText: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns. The user’s HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Howl
flavorText: The user howls loudly to rouse itself and its allies. This boosts their Attack stats.

name: Hurricane
flavorText: The user attacks by wrapping the target in a fierce wind. This may also confuse the target.

name: Hydro Cannon
flavorText: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Hydro Pump
flavorText: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

name: Hyper Beam
flavorText: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Hyper Drill
flavorText: The user spins the pointed part of its body at high speed to pierce the target. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

name: Hyperspace Fury
flavorText: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. This also lowers the user’s Defense stat.

name: Hyperspace Hole
flavorText: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

name: Hyper Voice
flavorText: The user attacks by letting loose a horribly loud, resounding cry.

name: Hypnosis
flavorText: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall asleep.

name: Ice Beam
flavorText: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Ice Fang
flavorText: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

name: Ice Hammer
flavorText: The user swings its strong, heavy fist at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user’s Speed stat.

name: Ice Punch
flavorText: The target is attacked with an icy punch. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Ice Shard
flavorText: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

name: Ice Spinner
flavorText: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around, slamming into the target. This move’s spinning motion also destroys the terrain.

name: Icicle Crash
flavorText: The user attacks by crashing large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Icicle Spear
flavorText: The user attacks by launching sharp icicles at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Icy Wind
flavorText: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.

name: Imprison
flavorText: If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.

name: Incinerate
flavorText: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

name: Infernal Parade
flavorText: The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also leave the target with a burn. This move’s power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

name: Inferno
flavorText: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

name: Infestation
flavorText: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can’t flee during this time.

name: Ingrain
flavorText: The user lays roots that restore its own HP every turn. Because the user is now rooted, it can’t switch out.

name: Instruct
flavorText: The user instructs the target to reuse the move last used by the target.

name: Iron Defense
flavorText: The user hardens its body’s surface like iron, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

name: Iron Head
flavorText: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Iron Tail
flavorText: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Jaw Lock
flavorText: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

name: Jet Punch
flavorText: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Judgment
flavorText: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move’s type changes depending on the kind of plate held by the user.

name: Jungle Healing
flavorText: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

name: Knock Off
flavorText: The user slaps down the target’s held item, making it unusable for that battle. This move does more damage if the target has a held item.

name: Kowtow Cleave
flavorText: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make the target let down its guard. This attack never misses.

name: Lash Out
flavorText: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. This move’s power is doubled if the user’s stats were lowered during this turn.

name: Last Resort
flavorText: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

name: Last Respects
flavorText: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The more defeated allies there are in the user’s party, the greater the move’s power.

name: Lava Plume
flavorText: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

name: Leafage
flavorText: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

name: Leaf Blade
flavorText: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and cuts the target to inflict damage. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Leaf Storm
flavorText: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Leech Life
flavorText: The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Leech Seed
flavorText: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

name: Leer
flavorText: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers their Defense stats.

name: Lick
flavorText: The user licks the target with a long tongue to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Life Dew
flavorText: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

name: Light Screen
flavorText: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special moves for five turns.

name: Liquidation
flavorText: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Lock-On
flavorText: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the user’s next move does not miss that target.

name: Low Kick
flavorText: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Low Sweep
flavorText: The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs, which lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Lumina Crash
flavorText: The user attacks by unleashing a peculiar light that even affects the mind. This also harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Lunar Blessing
flavorText: The user receives a blessing from the crescent moon, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

name: Lunar Dance
flavorText: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP and PP restored and its status conditions cured.

name: Lunge
flavorText: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Mach Punch
flavorText: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Magical Leaf
flavorText: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

name: Magic Powder
flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target’s type to Psychic.

name: Magic Room
flavorText: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns.

name: Magma Storm
flavorText: The user traps the target inside a maelstrom of fire that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

name: Magnetic Flux
flavorText: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which boosts the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus Ability or the Minus Ability.

name: Magnet Rise
flavorText: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

name: Make It Rain
flavorText: The user attacks by throwing out a mass of coins. This also lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after the battle.

name: Mean Look
flavorText: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: Mega Drain
flavorText: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: Megahorn
flavorText: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

name: Mega Kick
flavorText: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

name: Mega Punch
flavorText: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

name: Memento
flavorText: The user faints. In return, the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats are harshly lowered.

name: Metal Burst
flavorText: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

name: Metal Claw
flavorText: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also boost the user’s Attack stat.

name: Metal Sound
flavorText: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Meteor Beam
flavorText: The user gathers energy from space and boosts its Sp. Atk stat on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

name: Meteor Mash
flavorText: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also boost the user’s Attack stat.

name: Metronome
flavorText: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

name: Milk Drink
flavorText: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Mimic
flavorText: The user copies the move last used by the target. The copied move can be used until the user of Mimic leaves the battle.

name: Minimize
flavorText: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply boosts its evasiveness.

name: Mirror Coat
flavorText: A retaliatory attack that counters any special move, inflicting double the damage taken.

name: Mist
flavorText: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

name: Misty Explosion
flavorText: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move’s power is boosted on Misty Terrain.

name: Misty Terrain
flavorText: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

name: Moonblast
flavorText: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Moonlight
flavorText: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Morning Sun
flavorText: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Mortal Spin
flavorText: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

name: Mountain Gale
flavorText: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Muddy Water
flavorText: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

name: Mud Shot
flavorText: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Mud-Slap
flavorText: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

name: Mystical Fire
flavorText: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Mystical Power
flavorText: The user attacks by emitting a mysterious power. This also boosts the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Nasty Plot
flavorText: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply boosts the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Night Daze
flavorText: The user looses a pitch-black shock wave at the target to inflict damage. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Night Shade
flavorText: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

name: Night Slash
flavorText: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Noble Roar
flavorText: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: No Retreat
flavorText: This move boosts all the user’s stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.

name: Nuzzle
flavorText: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

name: Order Up
flavorText: The user attacks with elegant poise. If the user has a Tatsugiri in its mouth, this move boosts one of the user’s stats based on the Tatsugiri’s form.

name: Origin Pulse
flavorText: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

name: Outrage
flavorText: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Overdrive
flavorText: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

name: Overheat
flavorText: The user attacks the target with all its might. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Pain Split
flavorText: The user adds its HP to the target’s HP, then equally splits the combined HP between the target and itself.

name: Parabolic Charge
flavorText: The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

name: Parting Shot
flavorText: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Payback
flavorText: The user stores power, then attacks. This move’s power is doubled if the user moves after the target.

name: Pay Day
flavorText: Coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

name: Peck
flavorText: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn to inflict damage.

name: Perish Song
flavorText: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

name: Petal Blizzard
flavorText: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and damages everything around it.

name: Petal Dance
flavorText: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Phantom Force
flavorText: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: Pin Missile
flavorText: The user attacks by shooting sharp spikes at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Play Nice
flavorText: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Play Rough
flavorText: The user attacks by playing rough with the target. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

name: Pluck
flavorText: The user attacks by pecking the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Poison Fang
flavorText: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

name: Poison Gas
flavorText: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the faces of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.

name: Poison Jab
flavorText: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, an arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

name: Poison Powder
flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

name: Poison Sting
flavorText: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

name: Poison Tail
flavorText: The user hits the target with its tail. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also poison the target.

name: Pollen Puff
flavorText: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

name: Poltergeist
flavorText: The user attacks by controlling the target’s item. This move fails if the target isn’t holding an item.

name: Population Bomb
flavorText: The user’s fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that hits the target one to ten times in a row.

name: Pounce
flavorText: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Pound
flavorText: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

name: Powder Snow
flavorText: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also leave opposing Pokémon frozen.

name: Power Gem
flavorText: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

name: Power Shift
flavorText: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Power Split
flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

name: Power Swap
flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

name: Power Trick
flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

name: Power Trip
flavorText: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are boosted, the greater the move’s power.

name: Power Whip
flavorText: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to lash the target.

name: Precipice Blades
flavorText: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

name: Present
flavorText: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. The gift restores HP sometimes, however.

name: Protect
flavorText: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Psybeam
flavorText: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also confuse the target.

name: Psychic
flavorText: The target is hit with a strong telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Psychic Fangs
flavorText: The user attacks by biting the target with its psychic capabilities. This move can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Psychic Terrain
flavorText: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

name: Psycho Cut
flavorText: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Psych Up
flavorText: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

name: Psyshield Bash
flavorText: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This also boosts the user’s Defense stat.

name: Psyshock
flavorText: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This move deals physical damage.

name: Psystrike
flavorText: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This move deals physical damage.

name: Pyro Ball
flavorText: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Quash
flavorText: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

name: Quick Attack
flavorText: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Quick Guard
flavorText: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

name: Quiver Dance
flavorText: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Rage Fist
flavorText: The user converts its rage into energy to attack. The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move’s power.

name: Rage Powder
flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opposing Pokémon aim only at the user.

name: Raging Bull
flavorText: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. This move’s type depends on the user’s form. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Raging Fury
flavorText: The user rampages around spewing flames for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Rain Dance
flavorText: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type attacks. The rain also lowers the power of Fire-type attacks.

name: Rapid Spin
flavorText: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also boosts the user’s Speed stat.

name: Razor Leaf
flavorText: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Razor Shell
flavorText: The user cuts the target with sharp shells to inflict damage. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Recover
flavorText: The user regenerates its cells, restoring its own HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Recycle
flavorText: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

name: Reflect
flavorText: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical moves for five turns.

name: Reflect Type
flavorText: The user reflects the target’s type to become the same type as the target.

name: Relic Song
flavorText: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

name: Rest
flavorText: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and cures any status conditions.

name: Retaliate
flavorText: The user takes revenge for a fainted ally. This move’s power is boosted if an ally fainted in the previous turn.

name: Revelation Dance
flavorText: The user attacks the target by dancing with all its might. This move becomes the same type as the user’s type.

name: Reversal
flavorText: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

name: Revival Blessing
flavorText: The user bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party Pokémon that has fainted and restoring half that Pokémon’s max HP.

name: Rising Voltage
flavorText: The user attacks with electricity rising from the ground. This move’s power is doubled if the target is on Electric Terrain.

name: Roar
flavorText: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Roar of Time
flavorText: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Rock Blast
flavorText: The user attacks by hurling hard rocks at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Rock Polish
flavorText: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This sharply boosts the user’s Speed stat.

name: Rock Slide
flavorText: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

name: Rock Smash
flavorText: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Rock Throw
flavorText: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to inflict damage.

name: Rock Tomb
flavorText: The user hurls boulders at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat by cutting off its movement.

name: Role Play
flavorText: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target’s Ability.

name: Rollout
flavorText: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. This attack becomes more powerful each time it hits.

name: Roost
flavorText: The user lands and rests its body. This move restores the user’s HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Round
flavorText: The user attacks the target with a song. If others use this move, they will act immediately after the initial user, and the power of their Rounds will be boosted.

name: Ruination
flavorText: The user summons a ruinous disaster. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

name: Sacred Sword
flavorText: The user attacks by slicing with a sword. The target’s stat changes don’t affect the damage inflicted by this move.

name: Safeguard
flavorText: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

name: Salt Cure
flavorText: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every turn. Steel and Water types are more strongly affected by this move.

name: Sand Attack
flavorText: Sand is hurled in the target’s face, lowering the target’s accuracy.

name: Sandsear Storm
flavorText: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This may also leave them with a burn.

name: Sandstorm
flavorText: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to damage all Pokémon except Rock, Ground, and Steel types. The sandstorm also boosts the Sp. Def stats of Rock types.

name: Sand Tomb
flavorText: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

name: Scald
flavorText: The user attacks by shooting boiling hot water at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Scale Shot
flavorText: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user’s Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

name: Scary Face
flavorText: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

name: Scorching Sands
flavorText: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Scratch
flavorText: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

name: Screech
flavorText: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Seed Bomb
flavorText: The user attacks by slamming a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

name: Seismic Toss
flavorText: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

name: Self-Destruct
flavorText: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Shadow Ball
flavorText: The user attacks by hurling a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Shadow Claw
flavorText: The user attacks by slashing the target with a sharp claw made from shadows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Shadow Force
flavorText: The user disappears on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: Shadow Punch
flavorText: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

name: Shadow Sneak
flavorText: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

name: Shed Tail
flavorText: The user creates a substitute for itself using its own HP before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Sheer Cold
flavorText: The target faints instantly. This move is less likely to hit the target if used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

name: Shell Side Arm
flavorText: This move is either physical or special—whichever will inflict more damage. This may also poison the target.

name: Shell Smash
flavorText: The user breaks its shell, which lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

name: Shelter
flavorText: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

name: Shift Gear
flavorText: The user rotates its gears, boosting its Attack stat and sharply boosting its Speed stat.

name: Shock Wave
flavorText: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

name: Shore Up
flavorText: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP. It regains more HP in a sandstorm.

name: Silk Trap
flavorText: The user spins a silken trap, protecting itself from damage while lowering the Speed stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Simple Beam
flavorText: The user emits a mysterious psychic wave that changes the target’s Ability to Simple.

name: Sing
flavorText: A soothing lullaby is sung in a beautiful voice that puts the target to sleep.

name: Skill Swap
flavorText: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

name: Skitter Smack
flavorText: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Sky Attack
flavorText: The user attacks the turn after using this move. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also make the target flinch.

name: Slack Off
flavorText: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Slam
flavorText: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

name: Slash
flavorText: The target is attacked with a slash of claws, scythes, or the like. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Sleep Powder
flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of soporific dust that puts the target to sleep.

name: Sleep Talk
flavorText: The user randomly uses one of the moves it knows. This move can only be used while the user is asleep.

name: Sludge
flavorText: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

name: Sludge Bomb
flavorText: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

name: Sludge Wave
flavorText: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those it hits.

name: Smack Down
flavorText: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack the target. If the target is in the air, it will be knocked down to the ground.

name: Smart Strike
flavorText: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

name: Smog
flavorText: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

name: Smokescreen
flavorText: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.

name: Snarl
flavorText: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stats of opposing Pokémon.

name: Snipe Shot
flavorText: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

name: Snore
flavorText: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

name: Snowscape
flavorText: The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns. This boosts the Defense stats of Ice types.

name: Soak
flavorText: The user shoots a torrent of water that changes the target’s type to Water.

name: Soft-Boiled
flavorText: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

name: Solar Beam
flavorText: The user gathers light on the first turn, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

name: Solar Blade
flavorText: The user gathers light on the first turn, then fills a blade with the light’s energy and attacks on the next turn.

name: Spacial Rend
flavorText: The user tears the target along with the space around it. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Spark
flavorText: The user attacks the target with an electrically charged tackle. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Speed Swap
flavorText: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

name: Spicy Extract
flavorText: The user emits an incredibly spicy extract, sharply boosting the target’s Attack stat and harshly lowering the target’s Defense stat.

name: Spikes
flavorText: The user lays a trap of spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will damage opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Spiky Shield
flavorText: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Spin Out
flavorText: The user spins furiously by straining its legs, inflicting damage on the target. This also harshly lowers the user’s Speed stat.

name: Spirit Break
flavorText: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target’s spirit. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Spirit Shackle
flavorText: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target from fleeing.

name: Spite
flavorText: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

name: Spit Up
flavorText: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the move’s power.

name: Splash
flavorText: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

name: Spore
flavorText: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

name: Springtide Storm
flavorText: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This may also lower their Attack stats.

name: Stealth Rock
flavorText: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap damages opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Steam Eruption
flavorText: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Steel Beam
flavorText: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

name: Steel Roller
flavorText: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails if the ground hasn’t turned into a terrain.

name: Steel Wing
flavorText: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also boost the user’s Defense stat.

name: Sticky Web
flavorText: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.

name: Stockpile
flavorText: The user stores power and boosts its Defense and Sp. Def stats. This move can be used up to three times.

name: Stomp
flavorText: The user attacks by stomping on the target with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Stomping Tantrum
flavorText: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. This move’s power is doubled if the user’s previous move failed.

name: Stone Axe
flavorText: The user swings its stone axes at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Stone splinters left behind by this attack float around the target.

name: Stone Edge
flavorText: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

name: Stored Power
flavorText: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user’s stats are boosted, the greater the move’s power.

name: Strength
flavorText: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

name: Strength Sap
flavorText: The user restores its own HP by the same amount as the target’s Attack stat. It then lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: String Shot
flavorText: The user blows silk from its mouth that binds opposing Pokémon and harshly lowers their Speed stats.

name: Struggle
flavorText: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no remaining PP. It also damages the user a little.

name: Struggle Bug
flavorText: The user attacks by struggling against opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Sp. Atk stats.

name: Stuff Cheeks
flavorText: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply boosts its Defense stat.

name: Stun Spore
flavorText: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

name: Substitute
flavorText: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its own HP. The substitute serves as the user’s decoy.

name: Sucker Punch
flavorText: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

name: Sunny Day
flavorText: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type attacks. The sunlight also lowers the power of Water-type attacks.

name: Super Fang
flavorText: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

name: Superpower
flavorText: The user attacks the target with great power. This also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense stats.

name: Supersonic
flavorText: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

name: Surf
flavorText: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

name: Surging Strikes
flavorText: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This move always lands a critical hit.

name: Swagger
flavorText: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply boosts the target’s Attack stat.

name: Swallow
flavorText: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to restore its own HP. The more power is stored, the more HP is restored.

name: Sweet Kiss
flavorText: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

name: Sweet Scent
flavorText: The user releases a scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon’s evasiveness.

name: Swift
flavorText: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

name: Switcheroo
flavorText: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

name: Swords Dance
flavorText: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply boosts the user’s Attack stat.

name: Synthesis
flavorText: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Tackle
flavorText: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: Tail Slap
flavorText: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. This move hits two to five times in a row.

name: Tail Whip
flavorText: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Defense stats.

name: Tailwind
flavorText: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that boosts the Speed stats of itself and its allies for four turns.

name: Take Down
flavorText: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

name: Tar Shot
flavorText: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target’s Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

name: Taunt
flavorText: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

name: Tearful Look
flavorText: The user gets teary-eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Teatime
flavorText: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon currently in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

name: Teeter Dance
flavorText: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses every Pokémon around it.

name: Teleport
flavorText: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.

name: Tera Blast
flavorText: If the user has Terastallized, it unleashes energy of its Tera Type. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever is higher for the user.

name: Terrain Pulse
flavorText: The user utilizes the energy of the terrain to attack. This move’s type and power change depending on the terrain at the time the move is used.

name: Thief
flavorText: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.

name: Thrash
flavorText: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Throat Chop
flavorText: The user attacks the target’s throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.

name: Thunder
flavorText: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunderbolt
flavorText: The user attacks the target with a strong electric blast. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Cage
flavorText: The user traps the target inside a cage of sparking electricity that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

name: Thunder Fang
flavorText: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

name: Thunderous Kick
flavorText: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Thunder Punch
flavorText: The target is attacked with an electrified punch. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Shock
flavorText: The user attacks the target with a jolt of electricity. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Wave
flavorText: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

name: Tickle
flavorText: The user tickles the target into laughing, lowering its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Tidy Up
flavorText: The user tidies up and removes the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Toxic Spikes, and Substitute. This also boosts the user’s Attack and Speed stats.

name: Torch Song
flavorText: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song, scorching the target. This also boosts the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Torment
flavorText: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

name: Toxic
flavorText: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

name: Toxic Spikes
flavorText: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Trailblaze
flavorText: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. The user’s nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

name: Transform
flavorText: The user transforms into a copy of the target, right down to having the same move set.

name: Tri Attack
flavorText: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

name: Trick
flavorText: The user catches the target off guard and swaps the target’s held item with its own.

name: Trick Room
flavorText: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

name: Triple Arrows
flavorText: The user kicks, then fires three arrows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also lower the target’s Defense stat or make it flinch.

name: Triple Axel
flavorText: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

name: Triple Dive
flavorText: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target with splashes of water three times in a row.

name: Trop Kick
flavorText: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Twin Beam
flavorText: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Twister
flavorText: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

name: Uproar
flavorText: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

name: U-turn
flavorText: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Vacuum Wave
flavorText: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

name: V-create
