flavorText: The user emits a hot flame from its forehead and hurls itself at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Venoshock
flavorText: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

name: Victory Dance
flavorText: The user performs an intense dance to usher in victory, boosting its Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.

name: Vine Whip
flavorText: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

name: Vise Grip
flavorText: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

name: Volt Switch
flavorText: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Volt Tackle
flavorText: The user electrifies itself and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with paralysis.

name: Waterfall
flavorText: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

name: Water Gun
flavorText: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

name: Water Pledge
flavorText: A column of water hits the target. When used with its fire counterpart, this move’s power is boosted and a rainbow appears.

name: Water Pulse
flavorText: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

name: Water Shuriken
flavorText: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

name: Water Spout
flavorText: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

name: Wave Crash
flavorText: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Weather Ball
flavorText: This move’s type and power change depending on the weather at the time the move is used.

name: Whirlpool
flavorText: The user traps the target inside a violent, swirling whirlpool that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

name: Whirlwind
flavorText: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Wicked Blow
flavorText: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This move always lands a critical hit.

name: Wide Guard
flavorText: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

name: Wildbolt Storm
flavorText: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

name: Wild Charge
flavorText: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into the target. This also damages the user a little.

name: Will-O-Wisp
flavorText: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

name: Wing Attack
flavorText: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

name: Wish
flavorText: One turn after this move is used, the user’s or its replacement’s HP is restored by up to half the user’s max HP.

name: Withdraw
flavorText: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, boosting its Defense stat.

name: Wonder Room
flavorText: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

name: Wood Hammer
flavorText: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Work Up
flavorText: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are boosted.

name: Worry Seed
flavorText: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target’s Ability Insomnia.

name: Wrap
flavorText: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

name: X-Scissor
flavorText: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes, claws, or the like as if they were a pair of scissors.

name: Yawn
flavorText: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

name: Zap Cannon
flavorText: The user attacks by firing an electric blast like a cannon. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

name: Zen Headbutt
flavorText: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Zing Zap
flavorText: The user crashes into the target, delivering a powerful electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.
